sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS0150 ( DPOB_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_ZPCD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_ADDR , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DTL_PATR_ADDR , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_PHN_NUM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_FAX_NUM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_WRD_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_RFTA_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_FL_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_USE_YN , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DIV_TSK_OFFR , ACC_CD , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , CLLN_DEBR_NM , HMTX_ID , TX_OFFC_CD , BNK_CD , GRO_TNSR_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #payMangeDeptNm# , #degtrResnRegnNum# , #degtrNm# , #busoprRgstnNum# , #corpRgstnNum# , #corpDivCd# , #payMangeDeptZpcd# , #payMangeDeptFNdtnAddr# , #payMangeDeptDtlPatrAddr# , #payMangeDeptPhnNum# , #payMangeDeptFaxNum# , #payMangeDeptSealWrdNm# , #payMangeDeptSealRftaNm# , #payMangeDeptSealFlNm# , #payMangeDeptFNdtnUseYn# , #payMangeDeptWhlePernChrg# , #payMangeDeptDivTskOffr# , #accCd# , #hlthInsrSym# , #natPennSym# , #umytInsrSym# , #cllnDebrNm# , #hmtxId# , #txOffcCd# , #bnkCd# , #groTnsrCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #hlthInsrOfceSym# , #idtlAccdtInsurSym# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS0150 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM=#payMangeDeptNm# , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM=#degtrResnRegnNum# , DEGTR_NM=#degtrNm# , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM=#busoprRgstnNum# , CORP_RGSTN_NUM=#corpRgstnNum# , CORP_DIV_CD=#corpDivCd# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_ZPCD=#payMangeDeptZpcd# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_ADDR=#payMangeDeptFNdtnAddr# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DTL_PATR_ADDR=#payMangeDeptDtlPatrAddr# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_PHN_NUM=#payMangeDeptPhnNum# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_FAX_NUM=#payMangeDeptFaxNum# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_WRD_NM=#payMangeDeptSealWrdNm# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_RFTA_NM=#payMangeDeptSealRftaNm# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_FL_NM=#payMangeDeptSealFlNm# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_USE_YN=#payMangeDeptFNdtnUseYn# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG=#payMangeDeptWhlePernChrg# , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DIV_TSK_OFFR=#payMangeDeptDivTskOffr# , ACC_CD=#accCd# , HLTH_INSR_SYM=#hlthInsrSym# , NAT_PENN_SYM=#natPennSym# , UMYT_INSR_SYM=#umytInsrSym# , CLLN_DEBR_NM=#cllnDebrNm# , HMTX_ID=#hmtxId# , TX_OFFC_CD=#txOffcCd# , BNK_CD=#bnkCd# , GRO_TNSR_CD=#groTnsrCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM=#hlthInsrOfceSym# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM=#idtlAccdtInsurSym# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS0150 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_ZPCD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_ADDR , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DTL_PATR_ADDR , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_PHN_NUM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_FAX_NUM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_WRD_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_RFTA_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_FL_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_USE_YN , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DIV_TSK_OFFR , ACC_CD , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , CLLN_DEBR_NM , HMTX_ID , TX_OFFC_CD , BNK_CD , GRO_TNSR_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM FROM BASS0150 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , DEGTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , DEGTR_NM , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_RGSTN_NUM , CORP_DIV_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_ZPCD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_ADDR , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DTL_PATR_ADDR , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_PHN_NUM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_FAX_NUM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_WRD_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_RFTA_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_SEAL_FL_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_USE_YN , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DIV_TSK_OFFR , ACC_CD , HLTH_INSR_SYM , NAT_PENN_SYM , UMYT_INSR_SYM , CLLN_DEBR_NM , HMTX_ID , TX_OFFC_CD , BNK_CD , GRO_TNSR_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , HLTH_INSR_OFCE_SYM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_SYM FROM BASS0150 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD LIKE '%' || #degtrResnRegnNum# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0150 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_USE_YN , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG , (SELECT USR_NM FROM SYSM0100 WHERE USR_ID = PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DIV_TSK_OFFR FROM BASS0150 WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #payMangeDeptNm# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0150 WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #payMangeDeptNm# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_F_NDTN_USE_YN , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG , (SELECT USR_NM FROM SYSM0100 WHERE USR_ID = PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_CHRG) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_WHLE_PERN_NM , PAY_MANGE_DEPT_DIV_TSK_OFFR FROM BASS0150 WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #payMangeDeptNm# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS0150 WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #payMangeDeptNm# || '%'
